title: Sri Lankan Coastal Sanctuary with Onsite Spa & Eight Restaurants & Bars
description: Discover the beauty of the Sri Lankan coast from your beachside sanctuary at Anantara Peace Haven Tangalle Resort, cusped by the Indian Ocean near the old fort town of Tangalle. Golden-hued sands make way for wandering turtles, stretches of surf beckon guests to take to their board, and the coconut-palmed jungle opens up to vivid wildlife. Explore holistic approaches to healing at Anantara Spa for full-body restoration and tantalise your tastebuds at any of the eight dining and cocktail options.
